house_listing.house_description: This 1 level attached home built in 1981 has 2 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 1 car garage and approximately 897 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room, living room, master bedroom. Features include fireplace.
house_listing.firm_name: One Source Realty/Better Homes One Source Realty/Better Homes

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Dining Room, Living Room, Master Bedroom
